trans-unit.source: Specifies how the host name should be used in URI comparisons when dispatching an incoming message to a service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 指定的主機名稱的使用方式在 URI 比較中當發送傳入訊息至服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The value is used to specify the URI matching rules used by transports such as HTTP, Net.Tcp, and Net.Pipe when dispatching incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 值用來指定分派傳入訊息時，例如 HTTP、 Net.Tcp 與 Net.Pipe 傳輸所使用的 URI 比對規則。

trans-unit.source: Configure the value of the HostNameComparisonMode for a standard binding using one of the preceding transports, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>, using the corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.HostNameComparisonMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用上述其中一種標準繫結傳輸，例如設定 HostNameComparisonMode 值<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>，使用對應<xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.HostNameComparisonMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding.HostNameComparisonMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.BasicHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: Configure the value of the HostNameComparisonMode for a binding element using one of the preceding transports, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>, using the corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用上述其中一個繫結項目傳輸，例如設定 HostNameComparisonMode 值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>，使用對應<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement.HostNameComparisonMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Each value of the HostNameComparisonMode corresponds to a specific type of matching rule.
trans-unit.target: HostNameComparisonMode 的每個值對應至特定類型的比對規則。

trans-unit.source: The sequence of matching rules attempted is always ordered as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 符合規則的順序必定如下︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: StrongWildcard 2.
trans-unit.target: StrongWildcard 2。

trans-unit.source: Exact 3.
trans-unit.target: 確切 3。

trans-unit.source: WeakWildcard The first value, StrongWildcard, ignores the host name when matching and it takes the highest precedence of the three different matching modes.
trans-unit.target: Weakwildcard 可將第一個值，也就是 StrongWildcard，會忽略主機名稱比對和中優先順序最高的三個不同的比對模式。

trans-unit.source: It is the default value for a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] system-provided binding or binding element.
trans-unit.target: 它是預設值為[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]系統提供繫結或繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that a service endpoint can be reached using any valid host name.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，可以使用任何有效主機名稱到達服務端點。

trans-unit.source: For example, if MyService is hosted using http://localhost/MyService, it is still reachable using http://www.adatum.com/MyService because the (presumably valid) host name, "adatum.com", is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 MyService 使用 http://localhost/MyService 裝載，則仍然可以使用 http://www.adatum.com/MyService，因為 （應該是有效的） 主機名稱、"adatum.com"會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Note that the port is a wildcard here as well.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，連接埠亦的萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The second value, Exact, requires that an exact match is found with the URI specified, including the hostname, if no strong match is found.
trans-unit.target: 第二個值精確時，需要找到完全相符時，其具有指定的 URI，包括主機名稱，如果不找到任何強式符合。

trans-unit.source: This mode, for example, does not perform equivalence between short hostnames and fully-qualified domain names.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此模式中，不會執行簡稱與完整網域名稱等價。

trans-unit.source: This allows hostnames to be used as match criteria in the scenarios where multiple hosts are assigned a single IP address and it enables different services to be hosted on the same machine with distinct endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓要做為比對準則，其中多部主機指派一個 IP 位址，而它可以讓不同的服務擁有不同的端點在相同電腦上裝載的案例中的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: Note that the port is a wildcard here as well.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，連接埠亦的萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: The third value, WeakWildcard, matches by ignoring the hostname if no strong or exact match was found.
trans-unit.target: 第三個值，也就是 WeakWildcard，比對以忽略主機名稱，如果找不到沒有強式或完全相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as for StrongWildcard other than the order of matching: it runs after the strong and exact bindings have been tried.
trans-unit.target: 行為是 StrongWildcard 一樣以外的值比對順序︰ 執行之後的強式與完全繫結都試過。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > These values have no effect when used inside of the Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這些值都不會影響網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 或 Windows Process Activation Service (WAS) 裝載環境內使用。

trans-unit.source: In those cases, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses whatever hostname comparison mode is provided by the IIS Web Site hosting the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] services.
trans-unit.target: 在這些情況下，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會使用任何主機名稱比較模式提供 IIS 網站所裝載[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服務。

trans-unit.source: Uses the hostname when dispatching incoming messages to this endpoint, if no strong match was found.
trans-unit.target: 當分派傳入訊息給此端點，如果找不到沒有強式的相符項目，使用的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Ignores the hostname when dispatching incoming messages to this endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 分派傳入訊息給此端點時，會忽略主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: If no strong or exact match was found, ignores the hostname when matching.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到沒有強式或完全相符項目，會比對時忽略主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
